title: Cant login!
body:
I'm in NA, I've looked at this link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues and none of it works. I cannot login, and it says "Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here, if it looks good then follow the guide" (and the guide is the link above). Anyone else having this problem? The WIERDEST thing about this, is I actually logged in once successfully but I by accident logged into my wrong account so I had to exit, and I cant get back in xD
Any help?

replies.body: From looking over the boards it looks like there might have been some slight issue with the login servers earlier today. Most players have been able to get logged back in by now, but definitely hit me back up in a reply if you're still having problems!!
lots of people seem to have this issue right now.
Ditto here. Did their help steps and got nothing. I see this issue has popped up periodically over the past few months. Maybe it's something on their end they need to fix.
i'm having the same issue. still cannot fix
